10x1

white
0F 03 00 00 00 5E 00 00 00 02 42 4D 5E 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 36 00 00 00 28 00 00 00 0A 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 01 00 20 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 74 12 00 00 74 12 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 80 00 FF 00 80 00 FF 00 80 00 FF 00 80 00 FF 00 80 00 FF 00 80 00 FF 00 80 00 FF 00 80 00 FF 00 80 00 FF 00 80 00 FF 0B 01 01 02 02 03 03 00 00

-> per analysis, this seems to be bmp 

-> 0F 03 00 00 00 5E 00 00 00 02 is extranous
-> 0B 01 01 02 02 03 03 00 00 is extranous
